title: Todo Item
description: An inline item within a todo list. Can be a goal (broad objective) or task (specific action). Each item has a stable UUID for cross-referencing.

itemId.description: Stable UUID for this item. Does not change when the list is re-signed.

itemType.description: Whether this is a broad goal or a specific task.

childItemIds.description: UUIDs of child items (sub-goals or tasks under a goal).

relatedCommitmentId.description: UUID of a commitment that formalizes this item.

relatedConversationThread.description: UUID of a conversation thread related to this item.

assignedAgent.description: UUID of the agent assigned to this item.
